page.title: 10RECREATION HOBBIES
page.content: One of my main hobbies in 1985{ is{stamp collecting.}Stamp collecting has grown so vast - about ten thousand countries issue stamps. I have about three thousand stamps from all over the world including{American, Chinese, {Australian, etc.} I started collecting stamps when I was 7 and a half (l981). I have been collecting{ {postcards}since I was six (198O). I've got about 5OO postcards from all over the world,{Costa Rica, Spain, {France, Great Britain, etc.}When I go on my holidays I usually buy about twenty postcards. When I get home I put all the postcards in my postcard album. I've been collecting{coins} since I was 9 (1983). I have about forty coins from{Great Britain, {Ireland, France and Spain.} Graham Airey.
